steps.content: The main part of the page comprises the list of dataflows which you have access to

A dataflow is colour coded according to the current status – grey in design and purple when reporting is open. On the dataflow card, you can see various metadata – Your role; Delivery date; Dataflow name; Dataflow description; Associated obligation and instrument; Status
Filters and sort on the various metadata of the dataflows list allow you to find things easily in the dataflows list
This button will expand the menu, to show the icon labels
The static menu is available on every page and has four buttons. From top to button, the buttons are:
1. Dataflows – will return you to this page
2. User profile details – allows you to manage some global settings and see your user profile
3. Help – Triggers a help walkthrough of the page you are currently on
4. Notifications – Provides the history of all notifications (which appear in the top right of the screen) as a list
5. System notifications – Provides a tool to manage the system notifications
